pr_title: Add annotation validation to typeconversion expr

timeline.bodyText:
I'm not sure if this belongs here. Why are we moving this from SemanticAnalyzer, given that BLangAnnotationAttachment itself is not an expression, and only the expr part is?
We already seem to be doing the relevant semantic/constant analyzer based analysis in SemanticAnalyzer, and only seem to be calling into TypeChecker for the expression https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/pull/23829/files#diff-7123076514bbb67aa85076709d29ee0fL2880.
timeline.author: MaryamZi

replies.bodyText:
What I want to do is execute annotation validation logic from typecheker since that's where we see the annotation on a typeconvertion expression.
If not moving to typechecker we will have to move that logic to its own class, but I don't see any compelling advantage of moving to a separate class that moving to typecheker.
replies.author: rdhananjaya

replies.bodyText: It seems we do call back to SemanticAnalyzer from typechecker.
replies.author: rdhananjaya

replies.bodyText: Yeah, there was a similar requirement with streaming and it was decided to have this circular dependency for the time-being instead of moving the logic.
replies.author: MaryamZi
